activities.loc: JCB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Plea hearing on January 6, 2023 at 11:00 am.

10:28 AM Defendant John R Costanzo appeared by video, in custody from Polk County Jail.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for John R Costanzo.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.
Agreement reached.  Address and phone number confirmed.  Next date to be in person.  NOH to be sent to Defendant's address.
Plea hearing scheduled for January 6, 2023 at 11:00 am.

9:58 AM Defendant John R Costanzo in court.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for John R Costanzo.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Court reporter appeared by zoom.
Not guilty plea entered.  Next hearing to be in person.  No change to address or phone number.  Bond continued.
Plea hearing scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 10:00 am.

3:43 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant John R Costanzo appeared by video.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for John R Costanzo. 
Court relates. Attorney Rockow relates on waiver of preliminary hearing. The Court finds waiver is knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily given, finds probable cause and binds for trial. Address and phone number confirmed.  Bond continues. Arraignment set and must appear in person.
Arraignment scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on June 2, 2022 at 03:45 pm.

10:31 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant John R Costanzo in court.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for John R Costanzo. 
Request for preliminary hearing, time limits are waived. May appear by zoom video for preliminary hearing. Notice to be sent.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 2, 2022 at 03:45 pm.

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on April 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.

Must have no contact with the Rice Lake Menards.

1:00 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant John R Costanzo appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for John R Costanzo for today.
Quash warrant. Defendant needs to contact the Public Defender's office. State requests cash bond. 1:04 Attorney Rockow and Defendant put in a break out room. 1:09 Attorney Rockow relates and requests high signature bond. Court sets cash bond. Next date to be in person.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.
